attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry on the Rochdale grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: The government must hold a public inquiry into the grooming gangs in Britain. The British public deserve to know why it has been covered up!
attributes.background: Hold a public inquiry on the Rochdale grooming gangs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
